item.description:
Hi All-

I hope you can join me Thursday night for a FREE cocktail
at Whiskey Park in the Park Plaza Hotel.

This is on the T, so stop by after work or at any time in the evening and say hi! Come alone or with friends! I'll be there all evening :-)

The event runs from 5-9pm. We've partnered with LivingSocial, VeeV (the Acai Spirit) and Buyyourfriendadrink.com to put together a great evening!

To get your FREE cocktail, you *must* RSVP and print out your receipt at Buy Your Friend a VeeV.

(Be sure to use the link above- it will help support our group!!)

You can use your FREE drink for any VeeV cocktail, but I LOVED the Amazon Cooler (which is on their menu for $15).

Whiskey Park also serves appetizers and desserts, so why not grab a bite to eat, too?

I look forward to seeing you there! Email me if you have any questions!


~Beth

P.S. - If you can't make it this Thursday, check out other events coming up soon at VeeV Events
item.name: FREE Cocktail at Whiskey Park
